snippet: “Night and Fog,” which sparked an uproar when it was removed from the official Cannes lineup in 1956, is released in Germany on DVD for the first time.
abstract: “Night and Fog,” which sparked an uproar when it was removed from the official Cannes lineup in 1956, is released in Germany on DVD for the first time.

headline.main: Holocaust Film That Roiled Cannes Gets First DVD Release in Germany
headline.print_headline: 1955 Holocaust Film Gets DVD Release in Germany
